people_also_ask.title: Download & Play BUBBLE BOBBLE Classic on PC and Mac ...
snippet_data: Download and install BlueStacks on your PC.
Look for BUBBLE BOBBLE Classic in the search bar at the top right corner.
Click to install BUBBLE BOBBLE Classic from the search results.
Complete Google sign-in (if you skipped step 2) to install BUBBLE BOBBLE Classic.

people_also_ask.question: What is the point of Bubble Bobble?
people_also_ask.heading: If you're unaware of Bubble Bobble, it's a single-screen platform game where you play as a cute dragon who traps enemies in bubbles you've shot out of your gob. When they're trapped in a bubble you can pop it to kill them. Kill all the enemies on the screen and you move on to the next level.19-Jun-2018

knowledge_panel.description: bubble bobble is a 1986 platform arcade game developed and published by taito. it was distributed in the united states by romstar, and in europe by electrocoin. players control bub and bob, two dragons that set out to save their girlfriends from a world known as the cave of monsters. wikipedia
